actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: To extend the deadline under Part I of the Federal Power Act for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Nevada.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to extend for three consecutive two-year periods the time period during which the licensee is required to commence construction of a specified hydroelectric project in the State of Nevada.Provides for reinstatement of the license if it has already expired.

titles.title: To extend the deadline under Part I of the Federal Power Act for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Nevada.
